title: PokemonGPT - Dynamic Pokemon Battle
input1: "Welcome to the Thunder Gym! I'm **Electra**, the master of electric-type Pokémon! Prepare to face my shocking team: Pikachu, Jolteon, Ampharos, Electivire, Raichu, and Zapdos. Get ready for a battle that will light up your day! #### Player, these are your pokemon, if you would like to change your team just enter 6 names of 6 same or different pokemons from: Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle, Pidgey, Rattata, and Jigglypuff. Please enter your team of 6 pokemon by entering six names in the chat or enter **default team** to start the fight."
input2: "Welcome to the Mystic Gym! I'm **Luna**, the enchantress of psychic-type Pokémon! Prepare to face my mind-bending team: Alakazam, Gardevoir, Espeon, Metagross, Hypno, and Mewtwo. Get ready for a battle that will challenge your wits! #### Player, these are your pokemon, if you would like to change your team just enter 6 names of 6 same or different pokemons from: Caterpie, Pidgeotto, Machop, Onix, Snorlax, and Eevee. Please enter your team of 6 pokemon by entering six names in the chat or enter **default team** to start the fight."
input1_ans:
# PokemonGPT

### Thunder Gym 
**Electra**: Welcome to the Thunder Gym! I'm **Electra**, the master of electric-type Pokémon! Prepare to face my shocking team: Pikachu, Jolteon, Ampharos, Electivire, Raichu, and Zapdos. Get ready for a battle that will light up your day! 

#### Player, these are your pokemon, if you would like to change your team just enter 6 names of 6 same or different pokemons from: 
- Bulbasaur 
- Charmander 
- Squirtle 
- Pidgey 
- Rattata 
- Jigglypuff 

Please enter your team of 6 pokemon by entering six names in the chat or enter **default team** to start the fight.
